    • Method Detail

      • findComplex

        public static <A,B> java.util.Optional<A> findComplex(java.util.List<A> list,
                                                      B criteria,
                                                      java.util.function.Function<A,B> criteriaExtractor)
        Search for an item within a list without having to modify the list. This way, you provide a Function to convert the list type of item into the criteria type of item.
        Type Parameters:
        A - The type of the items in the list.
        B - The type of the criteria to search for.
        Parameters:
        list - The list to search in.
        criteria - An item to search for. Uses Object.equals(Object).
        criteriaExtractor - A function to modify each entry of the list to fit the search criteria.
        Returns:
        An Optional that may contain the found item.

      • everyOfList

        public static <T> java.util.List<java.util.List<T>> everyOfList(int every,
                                                                java.util.List<T> of)
        Creates a List of Lists of every OF items whithin the list of.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the lists.
        Parameters:
        every - How many items to contain in each sublist.
        of - The source list.
        Returns:
        A list of lists which contain the wanted subsets based on every.
